org.mpxj.opc

Class OpcReader

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.mpxj.opc.OpcReader

  • public class OpcReader
extends Object
    Access schedule data in Oracle Primavera Cloud (OPC).

    • Method Detail

      • getExportPollInterval

        public long getExportPollInterval()
        Retrieve the start value for number of milliseconds to wait before checking the export job status. Actual interval waited each time is exportPollInterval * exportPollNumber, where exportPollNumber is 1..exportPollCount. The default value is 1000 milliseconds.
        Returns:
        export poll interval in milliseconds

      • setExportPollInterval

        public void setExportPollInterval(long exportPollInterval)
        Set the start value for number of milliseconds to wait before checking the export job status. Actual interval waited each time is exportPollInterval * exportPollNumber, where exportPollNumber is 1..exportPollCount. The default value is 1000 milliseconds.
        Parameters:
        exportPollInterval - export poll interval in milliseconds

      • getExportPollCount

        public int getExportPollCount()
        Retrieve the number of times we'll check the status of the export job before giving up.
        Returns:
        number of times to check the status of the export job

      • setExportPollCount

        public void setExportPollCount(int exportPollCount)
        Set the number of times we'll check the status of the export job before giving up.
        Parameters:
        exportPollCount - number of times to check the status of the export job

      • getProjects

        public List<OpcProject> getProjects()
        Retrieves a list of OpcProject instances representing the projects in OPC. NOTE: the implementation of this method assumes you have less than 5000 projects per workspace. TODO: implement support for pagination
        Returns:
        list of projects

      • getProjectBaselines

        public List<OpcProjectBaseline> getProjectBaselines(OpcProject project)
        Retrieves a list of baselines available for a given project. Note: the implementation of this method assumes you have less than 5000 baselines per project. TODO: implement support for pagination
        Parameters:
        project - project details
        Returns:
        list of baselines
